label: ham
subject:
[sugar] [PATCH] olpc.datastore.dbus_helpers: Stop using internal
	interfaces in dbus-python.
body: When such men are only private individuals and before they get power, this is their character; they associate entirely with their own flatterers or ready tools; or if they want anything from anybody, they in their turn are equally ready to bow down before them: they profess every sort of affection for them; but when they have gained their point they know them no more.
